item.title: Introduction to Data Science for the Social Sciences and Humanities
item.description: So far, we’ve been leveraging GitHub Pages for publishing. This works great, but for blogdown we’ll start using Netlify. Let’s start RIGHT NOW with a site we’ve already built and published. Pre-requisites Pick either your postcards site, or your distill site from day 01. Refresh your memory- which repository was it again?

item.title: Data visualization
item.description: Pre-requisites First, make sure you have the latest version of the blogdown package installed from CRAN: install.packages("blogdoown") Restart your R session. If you use RStudio, use the menu item Session > Restart R or the associated keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + F10 (Windows and Linux) or Command + Shift + F10 (Mac OS). packageVersion("blogdown") [1] ‘1.0’ Create GitHub repo Online.
